biz.pavonis.hexameter.api

Enum HexagonalGridLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<HexagonalGridLayout>
      • biz.pavonis.hexameter.api.HexagonalGridLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<HexagonalGridLayout>

    public enum HexagonalGridLayout
extends java.lang.Enum<HexagonalGridLayout>
    This enum represents the possible shapes a HexagonalGrid can have. The name HexagonalGridLayout might seem inconsistent with the other names in this package but since the name GridLayout is so common (in SWT for example) using this name seemed appropriate.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      CUSTOM
      Represents a custom grid layout strategy.
      HEXAGONAL
      The hexagonal layout must have equal width and height and it must be odd.
      RECTANGULAR
      A rectangular layout has no special rules.
      TRAPEZOID
      A trapezoid layout has no special rules.
      TRIANGULAR
      A triangular layout must have equal width and height.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • RECTANGULAR

        public static final HexagonalGridLayout RECTANGULAR
        A rectangular layout has no special rules.

      • HEXAGONAL

        public static final HexagonalGridLayout HEXAGONAL
        The hexagonal layout must have equal width and height and it must be odd.

      • TRIANGULAR

        public static final HexagonalGridLayout TRIANGULAR
        A triangular layout must have equal width and height.

      • TRAPEZOID

        public static final HexagonalGridLayout TRAPEZOID
        A trapezoid layout has no special rules.

      • CUSTOM

        public static final HexagonalGridLayout CUSTOM
        Represents a custom grid layout strategy. It will add Hexagons to the grid based on the coordinates set by the user.
